author: Fundación Biblioteca Virtual Miguel de Cervantes

resources.description: SPARQL endpoint for the Bibliographic records at Biblioteca Virtual Miguel de Cervantes
resources.name: Biblioteca Virtual Miguel de Cervantes Bibliographic records

organization.description: The Biblioteca Virtual Miguel de Cervantes is a digital library, founded in 1999 with the primary goal of disseminating and facilitating online access to Hispanic culture by creating and delivering top quality content in Spanish or about Hispanic culture.
organization.title: Fundación Biblioteca Virtual Miguel de Cervantes
organization.name: fundacion-cervantesvirtual

name: biblioteca-virtual-miguel-de-cervantes-bvmc-linked-open-data
notes:
The catalogue of the Biblioteca Virtual Miguel de Cervantes contains about 200,000 records which were originally created in compliance with the MARC21 standard. 

The database content has been later mapped to RDF triples which employ mainly the RDA vocabulary (Resource Description and Access) to describe the entities, as well as their properties and relationships.
title: Biblioteca Virtual Miguel de Cervantes (BVMC) - Linked Open Data
